variables.label: Supabase Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/supabase/postgres/tags

instructions.start:
Postgres + goodies = Supabase Postgres
Unmodified Postgres with some useful plugins. 
Our goal with this repo is not to modify Postgres, but to provide some of the most common extensions with a one-click install.
instructions.end: Supabase (Postgres) is deployed and available as srv-captain--$$cap_appname-db:5432 to other apps. For example with NodeJS: 'const client = new Client({ user: 'cap_pg_user', host: 'srv-captain--$$cap_appname', database: 'cap_pg_db', password: '********', port: 5432})'

description: Supabase makes it easy to use Postgres.
